akn:section.akn:heading: Consultation with Standards Board and Board of Advisors

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 20987. Consultation with Standards Board and Board of Advisors The Commission shall carry out its duties under this part in consultation with the Standards Board and the Board of Advisors. (Pub. L. 107–252, title II, § 247, Oct. 29, 2002, 116 Stat. 1692.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was formerly classified to section 15387 of Title 42, The Public Health and Welfare, prior to editorial reclassification and renumbering as this section.
